text.div:
Legionellosis (Tests for Legionella species Antigen)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    17057-1 Legionella pneumophila Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen
    17058-9 Legionella pneumophila Ag [Presence] in Urine by Latex agglutination
    17059-7 Legionella pneumophila Ag [Presence] in Urine by Immunofluorescence
    26621-3 Legionella sp Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen
    31868-3 Legionella pneumophila 1 Ag [Presence] in Urine
    31869-1 Legionella pneumophila Ag [Presence] in Sputum
    31870-9 Legionella pneumophila Ag [Presence] in Urine
    32781-7 Legionella sp Ag [Presence] in Urine
    38460-2 Legionella sp Ag [Presence] in Bronchial specimen by Immunofluorescence
    38461-0 Legionella sp Ag [Presence] in Pleural fluid by Immunofluorescence
    38462-8 Legionella sp Ag [Presence] in Sputum by Immunofluorescence
    38463-6 Legionella sp Ag [Presence] in Urine by Immunofluorescence
    39541-8 Legionella sp Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Immunofluorescence
    41499-5 Legionella pneumophila 1 Ag [Presence] in Urine by Immunoassay
    588-4 Legionella pneumophila Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Immunofluorescence
    6445-1 Legionella pneumophila Ag [Presence] in Sputum by Immunofluorescence
